# subtitleVariants

**Instance Property**

An array of subtitle strings.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var subtitleVariants: [String] { get }
```

## Discussion

Each subtitle should be localized and ready for display to the user. The system selects the subtitle to display based on the available screen space.

## Getting Titles

- **titleVariants**: An array of title strings.
- **updateTitleVariants(_:subtitleVariants:)**: Updates title and subtitle variants.
